title: Hands-On Quantum: Teaching Core Quantum Concepts With Bloch Cubes
abstract:
Quantum mechanics is a notoriously abstract subject, and therefore
challenging to teach at pre-college and introductory college levels. Here we
introduce the Bloch Cube, a hands-on educational tool which can illustrate key
quantum concepts without equations. A series of videos have been created
showing how Bloch Cubes can be used to teach concepts such as quantum
measurement, quantum dynamics, pure states versus mixed states, and quantum
decoherence. Bloch Cube states can assist in the development of more
sophisticated concepts such as the Bloch Sphere, which plays a central role in
the quantum mechanics of two-state systems and quantum information science.
